item.title: Java Squeeze Repetition Characters in a String using Apache Commons Lang
item.description: In this Java tutorial we learn how to squeeze any repetition characters in a given String using the CharSetUtils class of Apache Commons Lang library. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); How to add Apache Commons Lang 3 library to your Java project To use the Apache Commons Lang 3 library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. implementation 'org.apache.commons:commons-lang3:3.12.0' To use the Apache Commons Lang 3 library in the Maven build project, add the following dependency into the pom.

item.title: Java Check a String Contains Any Characters using Apache Commons Lang
